column4: any body please tell me the command to restart the nautilus without restarting the whole system
killall nautilus it will auto restart
do i need to close all applications running at this time before doing so
sorry but didn't got u right
you only have to close nautilus windows. Then open a terminal and type "killall nautilus" and press enter
i m not able to install themes in my ubuntu 8.04? can u help me?
I'm back, my internet connection crashed,
the entries i made for zoel,
rename the file to .emerald, then emerald will find it
sorry, the theme you downloaded is in the wrong format. It has to be .emerald, i.e. this one:
You can download that theme and import it in emerald without problems.
click on the theme, so that it is selected.
Then: ALT-F2, type "emerald --replace" and press enter
Great! I just succeded in importin the m2F theme you found.
